LanguageData.EggBrushTurkeyUnfertilized.label: brush turkey egg (unfert.)
LanguageData.EggBrushTurkeyUnfertilized.description: An unfertilized brush turkey egg. It can be eaten raw, but it's much, much better cooked.
LanguageData.EggBrushTurkeyFertilized.label: brush turkey egg (fert.)
LanguageData.EggBrushTurkeyFertilized.description: A fertilized brush turkey egg. If all goes well, it should hatch into a chick. It can be eaten raw, but it's much better cooked.
